headlines.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scored his first Juventus goal since October to rescue a draw against Sassuolo, as the Bianconeri dropped points.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ronaldo ends goal drought as Juve slip up

headlines.description: Inter Milan moved above Juventus to the top of the Serie A table with a 2-1 win at home to SPAL thanks to a Lautaro Martinez double on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Martinez brace fires Inter Milan top of Serie A

headlines.description: A late winner from Theo Hernandez earned AC Milan a much-needed 1-0 victory away to Parma in Serie A on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milan's Hernandez scores late to sink Parma

headlines.description: Napoli's wretched run of form in Serie A continued as they threw away the lead in a 2-1 home loss to Bologna on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Napoli slump to Bologna defeat as wait for league win goes on
